techmeme.title: Airbnb reports Q2 revenue up 11% YoY to $2.75B, above estimates, Nights and Experiences Booked up 9% YoY, and Q3 guidance below est.; ABNB down 14%+ after hours (Natalie Lung/Bloomberg)
Seattle-based industrial analytics startup Seeq raised a $50M Series D led by Sixth Street Growth, bringing its total raised to ~$165M (Lisa Stiffler/GeekWire)
Amazon Music debuts Maestro, an AI-powered playlist generator, and Topics, which helps users find podcast episodes by topic and is powered by both AI and humans (Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch)
Release notes indicate macOS may get Apple Intelligence in the EU, unlike iOS and iPadOS, perhaps because of differences in how DMA requirements apply (Ryan Christoffel/9to5Mac)
Microsoft says Delta, which said it had to manually reset ~40K PC servers because of CrowdStrike, had "not modernized its IT infrastructure" and refused "help" (CNBC)
